Text: Thanks for this upload. I haven't seen this the original run back in late 60s. Hope you find more episodes.

Hulu has all 56 episodes, and I've been watching them there with short modern commercial breaks.  

Desi Arnaz appeared in at least 4 episodes as a Spanish matador named Raphael Delgado, starting in the fourth show.

Unfortunately I ran out of my downloader app's free trial and not prepared to get more of them.

But if that changes you'll know!
